name: Grim Reaper-The Cursed Soul
description:
Grim Reaper-The Cursed Soul is a Survival Horror Game, where you play as a guy who has to collect All the dolls hidden in the Hospital to Break the Curse  and free himself from the madness he has gotten into. This game was made with unity.

This game is inspired by Slender:The Eight Pages.

System Requirements:

recommended:

  • CPU: 3Ghz
  • RAM:4GB
  • GPU:(Any)
  • Disk Space: 160mb

minimum:

  • CPU: 2.8Ghz
  • RAM:3GB
  • GPU:(Any)
  • Disk Space: 160mb
